item.title: Essential Power: How the Motherboard Battery Keeps Your PC Running
item.category: "Computer Components" , "PC Maintenance" , "Hardware Tutorials" , "Tech Guides" , "Computer Repairs" , "DIY Tech Support" , "Motherboard Insights" , "BIOS Configuration" , "PC Building Basics" , "Electronic Troubleshooting"
item.description: Understand the Critical Role of Your PC's Motherboard Battery. Explore its functions in CMOS, BIOS, timekeeping, and hardware detection.
